attributes.action: pay comensation to the residents of Diago Garcia forced into exile for a US military base
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British Government has resisted and steadfastly refuses the residents of Diago Garcia any compensation after they were forced off their island to make way for the creation of a US military base.

Clearly "freedom" and democracy are empty words for these islanders.
